name: Python 3
updateContentCommand:
[ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo xargs apt install -y < packages.txt; \
    [ -f requirements.txt ] && pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt || echo '⚠️ No requirements.txt found'; \
    pip3 install --user streamlit torch asyncio playwright || echo '⚠️ Failed to install Streamlit or dependencies'; \
    sudo apt-get install -y \
      libdbus-1-3 \
      libatk1.0-0 \
      libatk-bridge2.0-0 \
      libatspi2.0-0 \
      libxcomposite1 \
      libxdamage1 \
      libxfixes3 \
      libxrandr2 \
      libgbm1 \
      libxkbcommon0 \
      libasound2 || echo '⚠️ Failed to install Playwright dependencies'; \
    playwright install || echo '⚠️ Failed to install Playwright browsers'; \
    echo '✅ Packages installed and Requirements met'

postAttachCommand.server: streamlit run client/app.py --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false || echo '⚠️ Streamlit failed to start'
